pages.text: The Ritual of Aura is an incredibly powerful ritual which can cast spells on nearby entities. It will take spells from adjacent runes, and will cast them on all entities in an area. Sensitive will make it target only players, or Extract can be used to make it ignore players. Can also be amplified with AOE, up to a default cap of 10.

The Ritual of Aura will be buffed by valuable blocks below it, often increasing the AOE cap or source discount. Finally, a beacon can be placed above the ritual brazier to further increase the range of the effects.

The base blocks that can amplify the ritual are: $(br)Diamond: increase total AOE and source discount. $(br)Gold: increase AOE cap and slight source discount. $(br)Netherite: greatly increase AOE cap, some AOE boost, and a massive source discount. $(br)Gorgon stone: increases source cost and AOE boost, but increases the AOE cap by an incredible amount! Not for the faint of heart.
